Package com.softserve.taf.services.placeholder.endpoints

Class CommentEndpoint

java.lang.Object
com.softserve.taf.services.common.AbstractWebEndpoint
com.softserve.taf.services.placeholder.endpoints.CommentEndpoint
public class CommentEndpoint extends com.softserve.taf.services.common.AbstractWebEndpoint
This class is an extension of AbstractWebEndpoint. It handles operations for Comment endpoints.
